abstract: The Internet movie download era may be more distant than you think.
snippet: The Internet movie download era may be more distant than you think.
lead_paragraph: Ten days ago, Netflix announced that it would abandon HD DVD, Toshiba's entry in the high-definition DVD format war. Six days ago, Wal-Mart dropped HD DVD, too. Then two days ago, Toshiba surrendered, marking the end of the most pointless format war since Betamax-VHS.

headline.main: Web Movies Show Why DVDs Sell
headline.print_headline: Web Movies Show Why DVDs Sell
